description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named ToDoController that manages CRUD operations for to-do items within a to-do management system. It includes endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting to-do items, with integrated Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for documentation.

classes.name: ToDoController
classes.description: REST controller for managing to-do items, providing endpoints for CRUD operations with OpenAPI documentation annotations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new to-do item.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all to-do items, with optional filtering by completion status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific to-do item by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing to-do item by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a to-do item by ID.
